Text.Name: Modifier_SpNpc_Ling
Text.Desc: This person has a deeply built-up foundation, with bottomless Qi energy.

Text.Name: Modifier_SpNpc_Shield
Text.Desc: This person has a body of iron, being exceptionally good at Protection skills.

Text.Name: Modifier_SpNpc_FabaoAtk
Text.Desc: This person utilizes an Artifact like thunder, with overwhelmingly astonishing power.

Text.Name: Modifier_SpNpc_FabaoLing
Text.Desc: This person utilizes an Artifact like mountain, with an indestructible force of solidness.

Text.Name: Modifier_SpNpc_FabaoSpeed
Text.Desc: This person utilizes an Artifact like lightning, with its speed as fast as a thunderstrike.

Text.Name: Modifier_SpNpc_FabaoDisp
Text.Desc: This person utilizes Artifacts with unmatched grace and elegancy.

Text.Name: Modifier_SpNpc_FabaoNum
Text.Desc: This person can master multiple artifacts.

Text.Name: Modifier_SpNpc_FightSkillAtk
Text.Desc: This person possesses unparalleled Spell Power.

Text.Name: Modifier_SpNpc_FightSkillCD
Text.Desc: This person has very fast Spell Cast Delay Recovery.

Text.Name: Modifier_SpNpc_Comeback
Text.Desc: When come face to face with arch-enemy, one's strength become stronger than ever due to the hatred.
